body.pre:
1 Schloime Breslavsky b: +First Wife b: m: 2 First Son Breslavsky b: 2 Second Son Breslavsky b: 2 <a href="#" onmouseover="addInfo(event, '(Hannah) Channa Breslavsky
Original member of the Schloime Family Society
Residence on 1/10/1920: Ohio with Rifka and Joseph Dolinsky
Residence on 1/30/1920: Eldridge St NY, NY with Esther and Louis Gratz
Residence in 1930: Bay 32nd St Brooklyn, NY with grandchildren')">(Hannah) Channa Breslavsky b: abt 1847 d: <a href="#" onmouseover="addInfo(event, '(Hannah) Channa Breslavsky
\"Burial\": Mount Lebanon Cemetery Glendale, Queens, NY')">7/06/1932 +Mortcha Kaplan b: m: d: bef 1920
